property.name: description
property.value: "Here lies Ms Lina Grimwin, daughter of Nikola and Ylaria Grimwin. Died to old agein 1039." There is nearly decayed pile on top of the tomb, that could have been a diary or a book of somesort many many years ago. Somehow you feel quite nostalgic and sad suddenly.

property.name: description
property.value: On the statue there is a plate that reads: "Lina Grimwin." She is sitting on a chair and reading a book. She has very friendly and comforting look on her face.

property.name: description
property.value: Guardian statue that has shield in one hand and holds sword high up in the other hand. Behind the helmet, face of the statue looks extremely sad.

property.name: description
property.value: Broken statue. You look at the head of statue that sits in rock pile near the statue, head is almost intact and you could swear it looks like it's crying.

property.name: description
property.value: You see some nearly decayed books on the table. They are unreadable, but you ascertain from the titles of book that most of them are about alchemy.

property.name: text
property.value: Door reads: "Tomb of Lina Grimwin." You remeber seeing her when you were young. She was always reading books and smiling.
